reviews.text:
A very nice hotel!
I stayed here with my boyfriend and the service we received here exceeded our expectations. The staff is very helpful and nice, the location of the hotel is perfect. Close to shopping streets with cafes and restaurants. The only small downside is that the beds are a bit hard, but the rooms are really worth the price. We really enjoyed our stay here, I would recommend this hotel to everyone. :)

Great hotel!
One star is deducted for only one reason: the entrance is not barrier-free. There is a small elevator, but you need to shout to the employees, so that they can come out with the key. Nobody responses to the ringing button.

I loved everything about this hotel. Location, price, bed, great pillow menu!

Please take my 4 stars as my good will to improve the one and only disadvantage of this hotel.

I was accommodated in the period June 22/24, 2024.
A lot of negative points for this 4-star hotel, they don't have a refrigerator, they don't have personal hygiene products, they don't have a coffee maker, room slippers, etc...
The most important negative aspect is the fact that at breakfast my bag containing money, cards and identity documents was STOLEN!
I received NO help from the staff and the surveillance cameras were not working!
I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL!

Another aspect to consider:
The hotel deleted the review from their page!

Nice sized room and the hotel is 15 minutes walk away from the cathedral and a few minutes walk from a shopping area. There's a bar downstairs but no restaurant (except for breakfast). Restaurants in easy walking distance. Staff here were helpful and small issues were fixed in a reasonable amount of time. It was quiet at night.
The rooms could have done with usb chargers as well as sockets, we were very surprised to find none. The pillows are unbelievably uncomfortable. They do offer a pillow menu, but there was only one other kind available which also offered none of its promised support. Every time we arrived or left through the front door there was a group of people smoking on the top step and no effort was apparently made to encourage them to smoke elsewhere.

Rooms are very nice tho a bit small but to be honest it is all you need for your stay. It is very centrally place, it’s a 15 minute walk from Köln HBF - also you can easly walk to many shopping streets - the area itself where the hotel is located is totally quiet
